10010001000000000000001111100000    // ADDI X0, X31, #0     // X0 = 0
10010001000000000000010000000001    // ADDI X1, X0, #1      // X1 = 1
10010001000000000000010000100010    // ADDI X2, X1, #1      // X2 = 2
10010001000000000000100000100011    // ADDI X3, X1, #2      // X3 = 3
10010001000000000001000000000100    // ADDI X4, X0, #4      // X4 = 4
00010100000000000000000000000000      // HALT:B HALT          // HALT = 0
10010001000000000000001111111111    // ADDI X31, X31, #0    // Bogus instruction - pipelined CPU may need it.
